messages.title: Join the Fightback.
messages.content: Nick Clegg, Leader of the Liberal Democrats, says: 'Every vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to change the direction of our country and stop a hard Brexit.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaigning to get the NHS and social care the funding they need.
Ensuring farmers and rural areas have strong representation.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a fight between the Conservatives and Lib Dems in Central Devon.

issues.brexitEurope: Every vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to change the direction of our country and stop a hard Brexit.
issues.health: Campaigning to get the NHS and social care the funding they need.

endorsements.endorsement: Every vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to change the direction of our country and stop a hard Brexit.

images.caption: A thank you message from the Liberal Democrats and images of Alex White with supporters.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes that the strategic voting consideration in Central Devon is a fight between the Conservatives and the Liberal Democrats, indicating that other parties can't win there.
